articles.author: Alex Heath
articles.title: Google CEO: Gemini AI photo diversity scandal ‘offended our users’ - The Verge
articles.description: In an internal memo, Google CEO Sundar Pichai told employees that the historically inaccurate photos generated by the company’s Gemini AI were ‘completely unacceptable.’
articles.content:
Google CEO says Gemini AI diversity errors are completely unacceptable

articles.author: Samuel Stolton
articles.title: Microsoft's Mistral AI Investment to Be Examined by EU Watchdog - Bloomberg
articles.description: Microsoft Corp.’s Mistral AI investment is set to be analyzed by the European Union’s competition watchdog at the same time that its deep ties to OpenAI Inc come under regulatory scrutiny.
